FERNANDO – Dr. BERNARD – In Loving Memory of Dr. Bernard Fernando. Beloved husband of Charlotte,​ father of Shalini,​ Shantal,​ Shiromi & Ramith,​ father-in-law of Dhammika,​ Romali,​ Shirley & Vilasini,​ grandfather of Sachintha,​ Ravinath,​ Maheshi,​ Maneesha,​ Shalutha,​ Shanaka,​ Nelaka,​ Sathnara,​ Saviru & Methnara. Remains lie at No. 18/​67,​ 5th Lane,​ Evergreen Park Road,​ Colombo 5 from 11.00 a.m. on Thursday,​ 4th April. Funeral service will take place on Friday,​ 5th April at 3.30 p.m. at St. Theresa’s Church,​ Thimbirigasyaya,​ followed by burial at the Borella General Cemetery.
